mean_cn: n. 缓解，暂缓，暂时的休息，缓期执行；  v. 使缓解，使暂缓，使延期，缓期执行
mean_en: a short period of time when you are able to stop doing something that is difficult or unpleasant or when something difficult or unpleasant stops or is delayed
sentence: She needs a respite after a long journey.
sentence_trans: 在长途旅行后，她需要休息缓冲下。
